name: Pilgrim (itch) (idlemind)
description:
This is a tiny little prototype platformer consisting of a single short level.

Please play and let me know what you think.  Your comments are important to me.

Move left - A / Left arrow

Move right - D / Right arrow

Jump - Space / W / Up arrow

Enjoy!

Art - OpenGameArt, Kenney

Sounds & Music - OpenGameArt

Font - Dafont

Design and Programming - Me!

P.S. - The browser version does not have sounds/music. Please download the exe version and use headphones for better exp.
